title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets.
reviewComments: Mind-bending and visually stunning. Nolan's masterpiece!

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
reviewComments: A timeless classic with powerful performances. One of the best!

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: When the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must confront his greatest adversary.
reviewComments: Heath Ledger's Joker steals the show. Intense and gripping!

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: The life of Forrest Gump, a man with a low I.Q., as he meets historical figures and experiences events in the 20th century.
reviewComments: Heartwarming and emotionally resonant. Tom Hanks delivers a stellar performance!

title: Breaking Bad
synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the criminal underworld.
reviewComments: A gripping tale of transformation and consequences. Bryan Cranston is outstanding!

title: Game of Thrones
synopsis: Noble families vie for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros in this epic fantasy series.
reviewComments: A grand fantasy with complex characters and unexpected twists. Winter is coming!

title: Stranger Things
synopsis: A group of kids in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries.
reviewComments: A nostalgic journey into the '80s with a perfect blend of horror and heart.
